---
title: "Pauli matrices"
---


The Pauli matrices are a set of three $2 \times 2$ complex matrices that are treceless, [Hermitian](Hermitian_adjoint.qmd), involutory and unitary:

$$
X= \sigma_x = \sigma_1 = 
\begin{pmatrix}
0 & 1 \\
1 & 0
\end{pmatrix},
$$
$$
Y= \sigma_y = \sigma_2 = 
\begin{pmatrix}
0 & -i \\
i & 0
\end{pmatrix},
$$
$$
Z= \sigma_z = \sigma_3 = 
\begin{pmatrix}
1 & 0 \\
0 & -1
\end{pmatrix}.
$$
